issue.title: [CF 60] Hide temp. weapon enchants for non equipped weapons
issue.body:
It would be great to just show the temporary weapon enchant reminder if there is a weapon equipped in that slot. Always when I'm fishing my OH slot shows a red question mark and wants to tell me, that there is no poison on the not equipped OH weapon.

It's not that important, would just be nice to have.

Keep up the good work and thanks for the fast bugfixing, you guys rock!


> Posted by CurseForge user erwinmeier | Imported from CurseForge issue #60 | Raw
